ing.item: BY 26-INCH ROASTING PAN TEMPERATURE: 350 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. WASH CHICKEN THOROUGHLY UNDER COLD RUNNING WATER. DRAIN WELL. PLACE IN PANS, COVER; SET ASIDE FOR USE IN STEP 2.
2. DIP CHICKEN IN SAUCE TO COAT WELL; PLACE CHICKEN SKIN SIDE UP IN PANS.
3. BAKE 1 1/4 HOURS OR UNTIL DONE (180F.)
NOTE: 1. IN STEP 1, 65 LB CHICKEN, BROILER-FRYER, CUT-UP OR 82 LB CHICKEN, BROILER-FRYER, QUARTERED MAY BE USED.
NOTE: 2. OTHER SIZES AND TYPES OF PANS MAY BE USED. SEE RECIPE NO. A02500.
NOTE: 3. IN STEP 4, IF CONVECTION OVEN IS USED, BAKE AT 350F., 30 MINUTES OR UNTIL DONE (180F.) ON LOW FAN, CLOSED VENT.
Recipe Number: L14601
SERVING SIZE: 2 PIECES (
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
